Name: Osiris standing
Description: The god Osiris is represented in a standing position, swathed in mummy bandages. The arms are crossed on the chest and are holding the crook (heqa-sceptre) and flagellum (nekhakha-sceptre). On his head is the double-feathered crown with ram's horns. On either side, on top of and underneath the horns are uraei with sun discs.
